about.title: About PJ Group
about.text1: PJ Group is a group of companies by Pavel Jaroš, offering a complete spectrum of real estate services under one roof — from sales and rentals, through interior design and renovations, to property management and maintenance.
about.text2: We operate primarily in the Karlovy Vary region, where we have deep knowledge of the local market and years of experience. Our goal is to provide professional services at the highest level with a personal approach to every client.
about.text3: Thanks to the interconnection of all four divisions, we can offer clients synergy they won't find elsewhere — buy a property, have it designed, renovated and subsequently managed, all under one roof.
